topic.title: antox是tox的安卓版  是开源软件  antox is tox's Android version is open source software
topic.body:
用antox 和朋友聊天还是比较安全的
Chatting with friends use tox is safe
如果有更高的安全需要可以把i2p打开
If there is a higher security needed    open i2p
然后在 antox 里找到 设置 把 enable proxy 选项打勾
And then found "setting" in the antox to enable the "enable proxy" option tick

proxy type :           http
proxy address :   127.0.0.1
proxy port :           4444

i2p 首次安装使用 需要做一次网络引导
手机打开shadowsocks翻墙
然后打开i2p 启动  等有了 "活跃对等端" 关掉shadowsocks 重启 i2p

topic.title: why bitshares crash Is there any insider message?
topic.body:
前段时间国内平台相继关闭 于是我把比特币兑换成了一些比特股 因为比特股是唯一一个钱包里自带去中心化交易所的 币种 去中心化交易所是不可能被关闭的
但是近期比特币上涨 比特股却大跌  有人能告诉我怎么回事吗？﻿
有没有什么内幕消息的？
The bitcoin exchange was closed in china so i buy some bitshares but why bitshares crash Is there any insider message?

topic.title: how to make i2p faster
topic.body:
at least 100KB/s
help Chinese people we want youtube and google

topic.title: how bitmessage avoid spam
topic.body:
The node will ask your processor to calculate a problem before forwarding the message for you
So spam messages require high processor usage

You can also send messages use some cryptographic tokens
i use bitshares it will cost 0.21851 BTS for every "memo" not suitable for sending messages
I hope they can improve it let bitshares suitable for sending messages fewer cost more message capacity

do you use bitmessage ? it`s safe and decentralized

topic.title: how zeronet avoid spam ?
topic.body:
bitmessage :                  Proof of Work . 
cryptographic tokens :  costs money

1_19xyLs9tyTZF9JaEcWBk5JtgWdYtQPQwt3.body: 测试了一下 代理服务器 似乎不能使用

2_19xyLs9tyTZF9JaEcWBk5JtgWdYtQPQwt3.body:
比特股的钱包前段时间不是更新了过吗
新钱包占用内存已经大幅减小了
怎么还会超过64G呢
我在windows平板上都能运行重钱包 4G的内存 系统还要占用1G
我还在一台旧笔记本上运行过重钱包  本来是2G的内存 我加了一条2G的内存条 总共4G内存  CPU 1.6G 双核
装了debian8.8 系统 自己编译的重钱包 运行起来没问题

“交易所本身要交易的还是比特币。”    我不同意 比特股 有完整的 法币 绑定 可以绑定人民币和美元  通过bitCNY可以将比特股 和 其它虚拟币包括比特币  兑换成人民币  目前好像是所有虚拟币中唯一的吧？

the memory consumption is over 64GB ?
i run the new bitshares full wallet ( BitShares-Core-2.0.170710-x64-cli-tools.zip ) in my windows tablet was OK
4G RAM CPU 1.83Ghz * 4

i also build and run  the bitshares-core with my old laptop system debian8.8    4G RAM CPU 1.6Ghz * 2
all good

we don`t need full wallet the light wallet will be good ( BitShares2-light )
maybe bitshares need develop a “command line API light wallet” for those token exchange website is easy isn`t it
